title: sundarEshvarar
sahitya:
sundarEshvarar sEvaDi paNindAl bandhamEdum illai kAN manamE


anupallavi

  vanna gOpuram minnum maduraiyAL kannal mozhi karuNai mInAkSi


caraNam    tolvinai aghalum alavAyinil kal yAnaikkuk-karumbaLittavar 
pal vidamAga manrADi vENDiya mannanukkAghak-kAl mATri ADiya
